channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects

item.title: CVE-2020-2695|2024-09-30T15:52:57.799Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20cc%20common%20application%20objects
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects product of Oracle PeopleSoft (component: Approval Framework). Supported versions that are affected are 9.1 and 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
